page.title: 10Home Life.
page.content: Uncle Derek woke all of us up at 9a.m. and we all hurried and got dressed. Then we had breakfast of either cornflakes or bacon sandwhiches.Dad took my brother and i to my Aunty Eve's in West Chirton while my sister Margaret went out to play with my cousin and Mam made dinner.At about 1o'clock we ate yorkshire puddings, pork,peas,carrots,potatoes and gravy. At about 2o'clock we went out to the leisure pool but to our dismay it was closed,we decide to play outside but it started to rain.At about 4o'clock mam ran us a hot bath after the bath we dressed in our clean clothes.I did violin practice and we all watched cartoons on the video.at about 6o'clock we had hot dogs,crisps and cakes .After watching "That's Life" on the television it was time for bed. by Melanie Dei-Ceci
